data.title: Russell Crowe girlfriend: Actor's rare move with Britney Theriot two years after notoriously private couple confirmed romance
data.meta_description: Russell Crowe and girlfriend Britney Theriot have made a rare public appearance together in Milan, Italy at...
data.text:
Russell Crowe may have been born in New Zealand and adopted by Australia, but Italy may also have a claim to the South Sydney Rabbitohs co-owner.

It was in Italy, after all, where Gladiator, the film that saw the 60-year-old actor's career soar to never-before-reached heights, was set.

It was also in Italy where Crowe subtly confirmed his romance with Britney Theriot after years of speculation.

Now, the notoriously-private couple have made their first official public appearance in more than a year. And yes, it was in Italy.

A smiling Crowe and Theriot – who have been in a relationship since 2020, but only confirmed it in July 2022 – were snapped overnight in Milan attending the Giorgio Armani fashion show during the Milan Menswear Spring/Summer 2025 Fashion Week.

Crowe wore a charcoal blazer, which he paired with a navy shirt, blue jeans, and aviator sunglasses.

Theriot, meanwhile, wore a cream blouse, baggy leather trousers, and dusty blue heels, which she paired with a matching handbag.

Singer and actress spotted on red carpet in rare joint appearance

It's the first time the couple have been officially pictured together at an event since the Australian Open in January 2023, where they were snapped courtside watching the Women's Singles Final match between Elena Rybakina and Aryna Sabalenka at Melbourne Park.

While they may not officially be photographed at events often, the couple aren't shy about their relationship on social media.

In April, Theriot shared a tribute to Crowe on her Instagram page, writing alongside a photo of the duo together: " Happy 60 years of life to the most legendary legend of all time. ❤️"

READ MORE: One of music's biggest names announces retirement

Crowe, meanwhile, confirmed his romance with Theriot in July 2022 with a selfie shared on his Twitter account, which showed the couple posing at the Colosseum in Rome with his sons.

"Taking the kids to see my old office," he captioned the photo, making a reference to his Oscar-winning role in the film Gladiator.

Crowe shares sons Charles, 20, and Tennyson, 2006, with ex-wife Danielle Spencer.

Spencer and Crowe were married from 2003 to 2018. Rumours of Crowe's relationship with Theriot first emerged in November 2020 – though neither Crowe nor Theriot have confirmed how their romance came to be.

In February, Crowe gave a rare comment about his relationship with Theriot, describing an intimate moment between them at a nightclub in the Czech Republic.
